mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.user_id AS "user.id", a.patrol_vehicles AS "patrolVehicles", a.vehicle_equipment AS "vehicleEquipment", a.individual_equipment AS "individualEquipment", a.departure_time AS "departureTime", a.status AS "status", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.missions_id as "missions.id", u3.patrol_content as "missions.patrolContent", u4.name as "user.name", u4.office_id as "user.office.id"
LEFT JOIN ccm_patrol_missions u3 ON u3.id = a.missions_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u4 ON u4.id = a.user_id
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) as counts, user_id as userId FROM ccm_patrol_unit WHERE DATE_SUB( CURDATE( ), INTERVAL 1 MONTH ) <= date( create_date ) AND del_flag = 0 GROUP BY user_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ccm_patrol_unit( id, user_id, patrol_vehicles, vehicle_equipment, individual_equipment, departure_time, status, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, missions_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{user.id}, #{patrolVehicles}, #{vehicleEquipment}, #{individualEquipment}, #{departureTime}, #{status}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{missions.id} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ccm_patrol_unit SET user_id = #{user.id}, patrol_vehicles = #{patrolVehicles}, vehicle_equipment = #{vehicleEquipment}, individual_equipment = #{individualEquipment}, departure_time = #{departureTime}, status = #{status}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, missions_id = #{missions.id} WHERE id = #{id}
